冨字的基本解释

冨
fù
古同“富”。

冨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fù］
［《廣韻》方副切，去宥，非。］
亦作“冨1”。
(1)财物多（古跟“贫”，今跟“穷”相对）。
(2)指财富；财物。
(3)充裕；丰厚；多。
(4)使富。使有钱财。
(5)使富。使繁富。
(6)通“福”。降福。
(7)“富农”的略称。
(8)姓。宋有富弼。

冨字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【冖字部】　冨； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页131第03
【正韻】富亦作冨。

冨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
冨字的起名意思

暂无。

冨
Basic explanation of words
冨
fù
Gu Tong is "rich".
冨
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fù］
["Guangyun" Fang Fuqie, Quyou, Fei. ]
Also known as "冨1".
(1) There are a lot of wealth (in ancient times, it was opposed to "poor", and today is opposed to "poor").
(2) Refers to wealth; property.
(3) Abundant; abundant; much.
(4) Make rich. Make money.
(5) Make rich. Make prosperous.
(6) Through "Fu". Blessing.
(7) Abbreviation for "rich peasants".
(8) Last name. Song You Fu Bi.
冨
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [冖字部] 　冨; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 131 03
[Positive rhyme] Rich is also a lao.
冨
